definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: The acting career plummeted suddenly, he relied on alcohol to release.
sentences.chinese: 演藝事業突然一落千丈，他便借酒澆愁。

sentences.english: After her acting career, Chen became a billionaire in the advertising business.
sentences.chinese: 結束演藝生涯後，陳曉旭從事廣告業，身價過億。

sentences.english: However, the stage of entertainment world is cruel.
sentences.chinese: 然而演藝圈的舞臺是殘酷的。

sentences.english: When I first entered the entertainment industry, there was another Song Jia who was already very famous.
sentences.chinese: 在我剛進演藝圈的時候，另一個宋佳已經很出名了。

sentences.english: Feng's high-profile in entertainment industry is bound to bring into broad controversy.
sentences.chinese: 鳳姐此次高調進軍演藝界勢必會帶來爭議。

sentences.english: Back in America, she became a recluse and wrote a splendid memoir
sentences.chinese: 回到美國後，她開始漸漸退出演藝圈，轉而寫回憶錄。

sentences.english: Fellow entertainers including Chow Yun-Fat, the couple's long-time friend, have sent condolences.
sentences.chinese: 娛樂圈內演藝人員包括摯友周潤發前至哀悼慰問。

sentences.english: He is currently the Head of Composition and Electronic Music at the Hong Kong Academy of Performing Arts.
sentences.chinese: 目前是在香港演藝學院作曲及電子音樂的骨幹成員。
生活是一場戲劇，你要演藝它。

sentences.english: Andy Lau is a highly acclaimed performance artist.
sentences.chinese: 劉德華是深獲好評的表演藝術家。

sentences.english: So how did she begin her acting career?
sentences.chinese: 朱迪▪丹奇是如何進入演藝生涯的呢？

sentences.english: He also serves as Chairman of the Committee on Performing Arts, HKSAR Government.
sentences.chinese: 陳博士亦爲香港特區政府表演藝術委員會主席。

sentences.english: She enrolled in performing arts classes and joined church choirs .
sentences.chinese: 她報名就讀表演藝術課程並參加教會的唱詩班。

sentences.english: This is somewhat of a artist's rendition, but they're at the very bottom of my RAM.
sentences.chinese: 這個是有點表演藝術的，但是它們在我內存的底端。

sentences.english: Over the weekend I’ve been in Fort Lauderdale as part of a performing arts seminar.
sentences.chinese: 整個週末，我都在羅德岱堡參加一個表演藝術研討會。

sentences.english: The TT side praised it as a world-class facility.
sentences.chinese: 特方讚揚表演藝術中心是一座世界水平的建築。

definition: peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
